titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow corporations to claim a charitable deduction for the donation of services related to contributions of computer technology or equipment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/3/2002--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow corporations to claim a charitable deduction for the donation of services, calculated at not more than $65 an hour, related to computer design or to computer technology or equipment (as defined by this Act).
